description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing room-related state in a React web application, including functions to fetch and create rooms via API calls.

methods.name: fetchRooms
methods.description: Fetches a list of rooms from the API and updates the store state, setting loading and error states appropriately.

methods.name: createRoom
methods.description: Creates a new room via API and updates the store with the new room added to the existing list.
